item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Current Number of Active Cases among Alberta Youth Under 1 Years Old 53 1 to 4 Years Old 313 5 to 9 Years Old 741 10 to 19 Years Old 1119 Covid-19 Cases in School Aged Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools Tracking of school cases stopped on June 30th, 2021.

item.title: Daily Covid-19 Briefing
item.description: Daily Covid-19 Briefing Monday, November 01, 2021 - Prepared by ALPINE1 As of July 29, 2021 the Province of Alberta has begun reducing the number of Covid-19 tests performed. Caution should be applied when interpreting these daily case and trend values as they may not be reflective of the wider population. Today 346 new cases of Covid-19 were identified in the province. The adjusted net total of cases is 1,210 including changes to previous case numbers between September 15th and October 30th.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 26 Edmonton Zone 41 South Zone 10 Central Zone 28 North Zone 27 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, Oct 26, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Vaccines
item.description: Covid-19 vaccinations are safe and effective. More information is available here on how Covid-19 vaccines and treatments are approved in Canada. For a list of completed and ongoing clinical trials for current and future Covid-19 treatments, see the Government of Canada's list of authorized clinical trials. Currently there are five vaccines and four treatments approved for use in Canada. They currently include: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (tozinameran) approved for use on December 9, 2020.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Jump to chart type AHS Zone Charts and Maps Daily and Cumulative Charts VOC Charts: Alberta Health Services Zone Charts and Maps Alberta Health Services and the Government of Alberta Covid-19 tracker began providing active VOC cases by AHS Zone on Mar 29. Charts reflect total values reported on indicated dates. Decreases in values reflect adjusted counts by AHS.
